Text: Top folder once you mount the iso folder to a drive, says activation, you will need a rar application.
I disabled firewall and antivirus program, tried to run the application and error message popped up, saying program contained virus would not run. What should I do?

At the top of the description, it says "64 bit" (no mention of 32-bit), but lower down, under System Requirements, it says, as minimum OS, "Windows XP Service Pack 3 (SP3) (32-bit)". So, which is it for, 32-bit or 64-bit only, or both?
